body: I'd recommend against adding these functions. It seems that [`TF_GraphNextOperation`](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.3/tensorflow/c/c_api.h#L837) provides the required functionality. So, unless this separate API provides some strong benefit (which I don't yet think it does), I'd advise against adding it.
body_html: I'd recommend against adding these functions. It seems that TF_GraphNextOperation provides the required functionality. So, unless this separate API provides some strong benefit (which I don't yet think it does), I'd advise against adding it.
